title: LoL client just quit on on me
body: I logged in and started a queue for Legend of the Poro King. after a few second a match came up and I clicked accept, so did the other 9 people. However instead of going to the champ select the entire client just fully quit out, no error warnings, no trying to connect to server .. nothing, just completely 100% closed! now I have a 5min wait time to get into a game, not really an issue but it wasn't my fault in the first place.. just wondering if anyone else having the same issues? Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you experienced this issue since?

Most issues that occur from the moment you click accept until you get into game are connection based, can you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
